channel.title: Im stuck, help
channel.description:
ok i need help doing this
i want if u talk to someone normaly he says like
would you like to buy ____?
then a button press to continue so it goes to the next window
Yes please Nah just came to bug you
and if press yes please opens a certain shop and if press nah just came to bug you it says
well then piss off!
click to continue
can anyone help?? i alredy have like 3 but cannot duplicate it... i dunno how can someone gimme a original piece of info i can work on
